channel.title: [Pi] Game modes?
channel.description:
How can I make different game modes and when at login you get to choose? And to apply different drop rates and higher melee hits and different xp. Also for modes veteran I want it to have infinite prayer.
Sir * No changes
Lord * Infinite pray * 100xp per hit
Veteran * Infinite prayer * Best drop rates * Higher melee hit
Rep++ for someone who does this I know this is difficult

item.title: [Pi] Game modes?
item.dc:creator: @Harvi Harvi
item.description:
@Harvi wrote:

How can I make different game modes and when at login you get to choose? And to apply different drop rates and higher melee hits and different xp. Also for modes veteran I want it to have infinite prayer.

Sir

  • No changes

Lord

  • Infinite pray
  • 100xp per hit

Veteran

  • Infinite prayer
  • Best drop rates
  • Higher melee hit

Rep++ for someone who does this I know this is difficult
